definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: In this paper, the acid rain's corrosion effect and its mechanism for natural white marble were studied by the simulated method.
sentences.chinese: 採用模擬的方法研究了酸雨對天然漢白玉的危害。

sentences.english: Gold reserves in the western mountains and White Marble marble, and rich reserves.
sentences.chinese: 西部山內蘊藏金礦和漢白玉大理石，且儲量豐富。

sentences.english: You find yourself in a White Marble Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 你發現你身處一個漢白玉走廊裏。

sentences.english: You instantly find yourself back in the White Marble Corridor.
sentences.chinese: 很快的你回到了漢白玉走廊裏。

sentences.english: These are known as the 'LingXing Gates' and are made of white marble.
sentences.chinese: 這些門被稱作“櫺星門”是由漢白玉雕制的。

sentences.english: He chiseled the figure of a girl out of a block of white marble.
sentences.chinese: 他把一塊漢白玉雕成一個女孩的石像。

sentences.english: It is reported that this is the world's largest piece of white marble.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，這是世界上最大的一塊漢白玉。

definition: the top part of a tablet
item made from woven silk or rayon
name of "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40)/see also 宀[mian2]
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
